contactUs.title: Contact Us
contactUs.subTitle: Please enter your contact details below. Once completed, send the form using the “submit” button below the form. Once the form has been sent, your e-mail application will open. You can also contact us directly by e-mail:

subject.title: Reasons for Contacting Us
subject.followingUp: Following Up on a Previous Request

contactUs.formTitle: Give feedback, ask for help or contact us to find out more.
contactUs.name: Name

thankYou.title: Thank you for your message
thankYou.message: We have received your message and thank you for contacting us. We will get back to you as soon as possible.

sbom.title: Software Bill of Materials (SBOM)
sbom.para: 30 day object retention policy. SBOM collected for whole application on any service's push to main branch.

accessibility.title: Accessibility Compliance Scans
accessibility.para: 30-day object retention policy. Accessibility scans are performed when there is a commit to the UI codebase on any branch.

test-coverage.title: Test Coverage
test-coverage.para: 30-day object retention policy. Coverage reported here is total statements - click 'View Results' to see more.

vulnerabilities.title: Vunerabilities
vulnerabilities.para: <0>Renovate</0> continuously scans the source code in GitHub, which will include any development dependencies, for vulnerabilities. Renovate will automatically create PRs with patches for these dependencies. The vulnerabilities represented here are the ones detected by the Artifact Registry. This is done automatically when a new image is pushed, as well as several times a day until the container image is one month old. The objects listed here also have a 30-day retention policy.

landingPage.title: Welcome to the cATO Safe Inputs Dashboard
landingPage.landingPagePara: This is an inital effort at dashboarding some of the outputs from the DevSecOps process. We only have a handful of metrics at the moment, but working to iteratively expand this.
landingPage.landingPagePara2: More details such as GitHub configurations and uptime metrics can be found in Observatory.
landingPage.landingPagePara3: Please let us know if you have any feedback.
landingPage.accessibilityText: High level summary - most recent commit per branch.
landingPage.codeCoverageText: Main branch - see Code Coverage section for all branches.
landingPage.controlComplianceText: Using Kyverno - only a handful at the moment.
